sentences.sContent: It is an important improvement in the survivability of the crew while maintaining the dynamics and payload of the aircrafts.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is an important improvement in the survivability of the crew while maintaining the dynamics and payload of the aircrafts.
sentences.sCn: 这对同时保持飞机的动力、负重以及生存性上是一个重要的提升。
